entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. High minus 9. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
